    Hi!

    I'm Nick Meyer. Currently, I am in graduate school at North Carolina State University studying statistics. I grew up in Michigan in a suburb of Detroit and moved to Raleigh in 2012 for graduate school. For undergrad, I studied at the University of Michigan where my highest priority was attending the football games. Go Blue!!!
